definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Brazilia is the modern capital of Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴西利亚是巴西现在的首都。

sentences.english: The Brasilia Plateau in November is verdant in comfortable climate.
sentences.chinese: 11月的巴西利亚高原，草木葱茏，气候宜人。

sentences.english: Brasilia is the result of a modern urban project designed by Lúcio Costa.
sentences.chinese: 巴西利亚是一个现代城市的设计项目，由海军科斯塔。

sentences.english: It, too, lost its moral impetus somewhere in Brasilia.
sentences.chinese: 绿党在巴西利亚的某些地方亦丧失了道德动力。

sentences.english: And, from Budapest to Brasília, an abundance of credit fuelled domestic demand.
sentences.chinese: 从布达佩斯到巴西利亚，大量的贷款推动了内需。

sentences.english: Alencar said he was delighted to welcome Wu in Brazilia.
sentences.chinese: 阿伦卡尔表示非常高兴在巴西利亚欢迎吴邦国委员长。

sentences.english: Clinton held talks in Brasilia with Brazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula de Silva.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿在巴西利亚和巴西总统卢拉举行了会谈。

sentences.english: Employees work on the reconstruction of Mane Garrincha stadium in Brasilia.
sentences.chinese: 在巴西利亚，工人们正在重建加林查体育场。

sentences.english: It gives me great pleasure to join you again in the beautiful city of Brasilia.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴在美丽的巴西利亚同大家再次相聚。

sentences.english: Health officials say 183 people have been infected in Brasilia.
sentences.chinese: 卫生官员称，巴西利亚已经有183人感染。

sentences.english: The house ER is situated 70km northwest of Brasília.
sentences.chinese: ER住宅位于巴西利亚西北向约70公里处。

sentences.english: Brasilia, replaced Rio de Janeiro as the capital of Brazil in1960.
sentences.chinese: 巴西利亚座新市1960里热巴西首都。

pinyin: Bu4 yi2 nuo4 si1 Ai4 li4 si1

definition: La Paz, administrative capital of Bolivia
